required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study in Healthy Male Subjects to Investigate Whether Administration of ACT-541468 Can Affect the Fate in the Body (Amount and Time of Presence in the Blood) of Rosuvastatin
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-center, Open-label, One-sequence, Two-treatment Study to Investigate the Effect of ACT-541468 at Steady State on the Pharmacokinetics of Rosuvastatin in Healthy Male Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: A study in healthy male subjects to investigate whether administration of ACT-541468 can affect the fate in the body (amount and time of presence in the blood) of rosuvastatin

primary_outcome.measure: Effect of ACT-541468 at steady-state on Cmax of single-dose rosuvastatin
primary_outcome.time_frame: During administration of rosuvastatin (Treatment A) and both rosuvastatin and ACT-541468 (Treatment B2); i.e. for about 2 weeks.
primary_outcome.description: Effect of ACT-541468 at steady-state on Cmax of single-dose rosuvastatin

primary_outcome.measure: Effect of ACT-541468 at steady-state on tmax of single-dose rosuvastatin
primary_outcome.time_frame: During administration of rosuvastatin (Treatment A) and both rosuvastatin and ACT-541468 (Treatment B2); i.e. for about 2 weeks.
primary_outcome.description: Effect of ACT-541468 at steady-state on tmax of single-dose rosuvastatin

primary_outcome.measure: Effect of ACT-541468 at steady-state on AUC0-t of single-dose rosuvastatin
primary_outcome.time_frame: During administration of rosuvastatin (Treatment A) and both rosuvastatin and ACT-541468 (Treatment B2); i.e. for about 2 weeks.
primary_outcome.description: Effect of ACT-541468 at steady-state on AUC0-t of single-dose rosuvastatin

primary_outcome.time_frame: During administration of rosuvastatin (Treatment A) and both rosuvastatin and ACT-541468 (Treatment B2); i.e. for about 2 weeks.

primary_outcome.measure: Effect of ACT-541468 at steady-state on t½ of single-dose rosuvastatin
primary_outcome.time_frame: During administration of rosuvastatin (Treatment A) and both rosuvastatin and ACT-541468 (Treatment B2); i.e. for about 2 weeks.
primary_outcome.description: Effect of ACT-541468 at steady-state on t½ of single-dose rosuvastatin

secondary_outcome.time_frame: During ACT-541468 administration (Treatment B1 and B2); i.e. for about 1 week
From Screening to EOS (for a maximum of up to 5 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to each time point of measurement during each treatment in vital signs (supine BP and pulse rate)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Screening to EOS (for a maximum of up to 5 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to each time point of measurement during each treatment in ECG variables

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Screening to EOS (for a maximum of up to 5 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: Treatment-emergent AEs and SAEs during each treatment

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Screening to EOS (for a maximum of up to 5 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: Treatment-emergent ECG abnormalities during each treatment

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Screening to EOS (for a maximum of up to 5 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to each time point of measurement during each treatment in body weight

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Screening to EOS (for a maximum of up to 5 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline to each time point of measurement during each treatment in clinical laboratory tests

arm_group.description: Rosuvastatin Day 8; ACT-541468 Day 8 to Day 12
